metadata.title: CVE-2015-2704 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
realmd allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary configurations in tosssd.conf and smb.conf via a newline character in an LDAP response.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

realmd - 0.15.0-1ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: realmd package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.15.0-1ubuntu0.1+esm1').
